property.name: text
property.value: This actor accepts a DE token and iff ON is true: 1-generates a timestamp and microstep on receipt, 2-displays the timestamp, microstep and token

property.name: text
property.value: This actor publishes at t=0 the values of all global parameters. Each 1588 clock subscribes to this publication and uses the received values to initialize local copies of these parameters.

property.name: text
property.value: useStepsRemoved and useFixedN are mutually exclusive

property.name: text
property.value: This actor increments the stepsRemoved attribute in an Announce message by the value of "bumpBy"

property.name: text
value
property.value: {sequenceNum, sourceIdentity, sourcePort, gmPriority, gmClass, gmVariance, gmIdentity, stepsRemoved, receivingIdentity, receivingPort,extra0,extra1}

property.name: text
property.value:
Plot Key:
L: listen =>0 S: slave =>1 P: passive =>2 Pre: pre-master =>3 M: master =>4 M3: master =>4
